# Tables {.unnumbered}

```{r}
#| include: true
#| label: tbl-data
#| tbl-cap: "Data"
#| column: body-outset

dat <- iris |>
  summary() |>
  knitr::kable()

if (knitr::opts_knit$get("rmarkdown.pandoc.to") == "latex") {
  dat |>
  kableExtra::kable_styling(latex_options = "HOLD_position")
} else {
  dat
}
```
